diary.contentPlaceholder: Describe your day: what you did, people you met, places you visited...

diary.sortEarliestFirst: Sort entries from oldest to newest

diary.catchUpTitle: Great job! Ready for the next one?
diary.catchUpDescription: Continue your streak by writing the entry for {date}.
diary.refineModeHelp: Highlight text to mark people or locations, or click existing chips to edit.

insights.title: Person Insights
insights.description: Add notes about your interactions. AI will analyze this to automatically update their profiles.
insights.placeholder: What did you talk about? Did you learn anything new about them?

diary.noWeatherLocation: Weather information not available for this location.

reviewGuidance.title: AI Processing Complete
reviewGuidance.description: Review the extracted people and places below, then click Mark as Reviewed to confirm.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.reviewDescription: These diary entries have been processed by AI. Review the extracted people and places to confirm they are correct.

hero.title: Note Neko
hero.subtitle: Journal daily. Let AI remember the people and places that matter.

demo.title: See How It Works
demo.subtitle: Write about your day. AI identifies the people and places you mention and builds rich profiles automatically.
demo.line1: Had coffee with Sarah today at Blue Bottle.
demo.line2: She mentioned she's training for a marathon.
demo.line3: We talked about her new job at the design studio.

walkthrough.title: The App in Action
walkthrough.subtitle: Follow the journey from writing a diary entry to building rich relationship profiles.
walkthrough.diaryAlt: Diary page with map and creating a new entry
walkthrough.diaryDescription: See your diary entries on a map with every location you've visited. Click to create a new entry and write about your day.
walkthrough.extractionAlt: AI extracting people and locations from diary text
walkthrough.extractionDescription: As you type, AI identifies the people and places you mention — matching them to existing profiles or creating new ones.
walkthrough.profileAlt: Person profile page with AI suggestions
walkthrough.profileDescription: Click any person to see their full profile — interests, conversation topics, and AI-powered suggestions for deepening the relationship.

diary.title: Therapeutic Journaling
diary.description: Write freely about your day. Journaling reduces stress, boosts emotional clarity, and helps you process your experiences.

people.title: Relationship Memory
people.description: AI extracts people from your entries and builds detailed profiles — interests, life events, conversation topics — so you never forget what matters.

places.title: Places & Moments
places.description: Every location you mention is tracked and linked. Revisit the cafes, parks, and cities that shaped your memories.

openSource.title: Open Source & Privacy First
openSource.subtitle: Your journal is deeply personal. Note Neko is built to respect that.
openSource.ossDescription: Licensed under AGPL-3.0. Inspect every line of code, contribute, or self-host on your own server.
openSource.privacyDescription: No ads, no tracking, no selling your data. Your entries are never used to train AI models.
openSource.selfHostDescription: Run Note Neko on your own infrastructure for complete control over your data.

sarah.name: Sarah "Forgot-Your-Name" Chen
sarah.title: Professional People Pleaser
sarah.quote: Now I can forget names with confidence!

michael.name: Michael "Lost & Found" Rodriguez
michael.title: Certified Directionally Challenged
michael.quote: Finally, a diary that doesn't judge my 3 AM thoughts!

error.updateFailed: Failed to update. Please try again.
error.deleteFailed: Failed to delete. Please try again.

location.title: Location Error
location.unsupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Note Neko ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our service.

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.description: When you create an account, we collect your email address and a securely hashed password. We never store your password in plain text.

diaryContent.title: Diary Content
diaryContent.description: We store the diary entries you write, including text content, dates, and any locations you associate with entries.

extractedData.title: AI-Extracted Data
extractedData.description: When you submit a diary entry, our AI processes the text to automatically extract mentions of people and places. This extracted data (names, locations, relationships) is stored in your account.

locationData.title: Location Data
locationData.description: If you enable browser location or set a default location, we store geographic coordinates to associate with your diary entries. Location data is used solely for your personal diary records.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use the following third-party services to provide our functionality:

openrouter.title: OpenRouter (AI Processing)
openrouter.description: Your diary entry text is sent to AI language models via OpenRouter to extract people and places mentioned in your entries. We do not send your email, password, or any other account information. OpenRouter's processing is subject to their privacy policy.

googleMaps.title: Google Maps (Location Services)
googleMaps.description: When you search for locations, your search queries are sent to Google Maps API for geocoding. No diary content or personal information is shared with Google.

sentry.title: Sentry (Error Monitoring)
sentry.description: We use Sentry to track application errors and improve reliability. Error reports may contain technical information about your browser and session but do not include diary content.

vercel.title: Vercel (Hosting & Analytics)
vercel.description: Our application is hosted on Vercel. We use Vercel Analytics and Speed Insights to monitor performance. These tools collect anonymous usage data and do not track individual users.

noTraining.title: Your Data Is Not Used for AI Training
noTraining.description: We want to be explicit: your diary entries, personal information, and any data you provide to Note Neko are never used to train AI models. Your data is processed solely to provide you with the service features you use.

dataOwnership.title: Data Ownership & Portability
dataOwnership.description: You own all the content you create in Note Neko. Your diary entries, people profiles, and location data belong to you. We plan to provide a data export feature so you can download all your data at any time.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take reasonable measures to protect your data, including secure password hashing, HTTPS encryption for all data in transit, and database-level encryption at rest. Access to production databases is strictly limited.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use essential cookies for authentication (keeping you logged in) and session management. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, all associated data will be permanently removed from our systems.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Note Neko is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify registered users of any material changes via email or an in-app notification.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms") carefully before using Note Neko. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.description: Note Neko is a personal diary and relationship management application. It allows you to write diary entries, which are processed by AI to automatically extract and organize mentions of people and places you interact with.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.description: You must create an account to use Note Neko. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials. You must provide accurate information when creating your account and must not share your login credentials with others.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.ownership: You retain full ownership of all content you create in Note Neko, including diary entries, people profiles, and any other data you input.
userContent.license: By using our service, you grant us a limited license to store, process, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the service to you. We will not share, sell, or use your content for any other purpose.
userContent.responsibility: You are solely responsible for the content you create. You agree not to use the service to store illegal, harmful, or infringing content.

aiProcessing.title: AI Processing
aiProcessing.description: Note Neko uses AI language models to process your diary entries and extract information about people and places. By using this feature, you acknowledge that:

items.sent: Your diary text is sent to third-party AI providers (via OpenRouter) for processing.
items.accuracy: AI-generated extractions may not always be accurate. You should review and correct any AI-extracted information.
items.noTraining: Your data is not used to train AI models.

items.unauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to other users' data or our systems.
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the service or its infrastructure.
items.abuse: Use the service for any illegal purpose or to violate any laws.
items.scrape: Scrape, crawl, or use automated means to access the service without our permission.
items.reverse: Reverse-engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the service, except where permitted by applicable open-source licenses.

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.description: We strive to keep Note Neko available at all times, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. The service may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, updates, or circumstances beyond our control.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Note Neko is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of data, arising from your use of the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms. You may delete your account at any time. Upon termination, your data will be permanently deleted from our systems.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.description: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify registered users of any material changes. Your continued use of the service after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the service operator resides, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

data.title: Data Management
